recommendations.title: Notify when an agent takes multiple listings offline
recommendations.description: Ardit Gjonaj from Rye has taken multiple listings offline. We’ve identified this as an indicator that they might be getting ready to switch brokerages.
recommendations.mail_body:
Hello __first_name,

I was looking through our data and noticed you've taken some of your listings off of the MLS. I would love to schedule some time to meet and see how we can help.

Are you around next week?

recommendations.title: Notification of Agents Anniversary
recommendations.description: Today is Eugenie Meluso anniversary date of joining the company. They have been with the company since 2013. We recommend reaching out to congratulate them and thank them for being part of the company.
recommendations.mail_body:
Hi __first_name,

Congratulations and thank you for being part of our company. We are so happy you have been with us since __join_year. Let’s set a time to discuss the past and the future.

Thank you!

recommendations.title: Notify of High Value Transaction
recommendations.description: An agent in your network, Jamie Smith, just closed a high-value transaction of $10 million. This is an excellent opportunity to reach out and congratulate them.
recommendations.mail_body:
Hello __first_name,

Congratulations on closing a high-value transaction! This is a significant achievement. Let's schedule a time to discuss how we can further support your success.

Thank you!

recommendations.title: Quarterly Financial Review Reminder
recommendations.description: Reminder to schedule your quarterly financial review with the agents in your region. This helps in understanding their performance and planning future strategies.
recommendations.mail_body:
Hi __first_name,

It's time for our quarterly financial review. Let's set a time to discuss your recent performance and plan for the upcoming quarter.

Best regards,
